title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; identical operations to JS client (chat, generate, embeddings) with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat module inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app example consuming Ollama’s streaming chat endpoint via EventSource.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama (chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings) with Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint with jq examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, Postgres, and nginx for home labs.

title: ollama-npm-downloads
summary: Official npm package page showing weekly download stats and quick-start snippets.

title: ollama-pypi-stats
summary: Official PyPI project page with install instructions and release history.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing custom modelfiles, benchmarks, UI projects, and troubleshooting.

title: Show HN: Ollama Hub – Community Model Registry
summary: HN thread announcing community-curated registry of custom Ollama modelfiles with one-line install.

title: Ollama on Apple Silicon – Benchmark Roundup
summary: Blog post comparing Llama-3, Phi-3, and Gemma inference speeds across M1/M2/M3 chips using Ollama.

title: Ollama Discord & Matrix Communities
summary: Official invite to real-time chat rooms for support, announcements, and plugin showcase.
